channel.title: 2 questions i need help with
channel.description:
HELP 1, I want to know how, in my server, i can make a new tele tab in the tab box. You know where you have "home", "train" things like that, I want to make a new one but not quite sure how. 317 server btw.
2, I want to know if you can change if the npcs attack you or not. I'm really confused over this subject, because sometimes they attack me, sometimes they don't. So i want to know how to make it so they do not attack any player in game.
If you can help plz do, if not, thx for reading it anyway.
